name: DoubleResetDetector_Generic
keywords: eeprom, flashstorage-samd, flashstorage-stm32, avr, teensy, sam-due, samd, stm32, nRF52, double-reset, multi-reset, detector, flashstorage, dueflashstorage, littlefs, spiffs, reset, data
description: Library to detect a double reset, using EEPROM, DueFlashStorage, FlashStorage_SAMD, FlashStorage_STM32 or LittleFS/InternalFS. For AVR, Teensy, SAM DUE, SAMD, STM32F/L/H/G/WB/MP1, nRF52, etc. boards. Now using efficient FlashStorage_STM32 library and supporting new STM32 core v2.0.0 as well as v1.9.0
